body: I like how this book is like: "Well, better get pregnant before finishing school! It would be a shame if we had proper priorities..."
agree... the site has a shitty tracking system. the favorite for me is just a way to know what i read or not.
That's not even the point. If they were organized so that it updated as the same series you wouldn't have to unfavorite anything. And it would get rid of the ridiculous amount of clutter here.

This site really needs a better way to update ongoing series and translations. Seeing all of my recommendations being this exact same series with one fewer page each time is amusing, sure, but it's also just a really bad system.
The new pages just keep cumming and cumming, this glorious lewd train just doesn't stop.
